t: The Best Bottled Waters That Taste Fresh and Quench Your Thirst
s: Best Overall: Mountain Valley Spring Water at Amazon $54 Jump to Review ... In the Ouachita Mountains, Mountain Valley produces fresh water from an untamed water source—natural hot springs on the hills above Little Rock, Arkansas. Thanks to the crisp mountain air, each bottle boasts fresh-tasting spring water favored by everyone from Elvis Presley to Dwight Eisenhower.  · The spring water retains the nutrients and minerals found in the Ouachita region—the brand ...
